issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
Pressing "Abort" button before XHR file download returns

 Script Error = 'null' is not an object (evaluating 'o.abort') at xhr_filedownload.js (line 1).

Not a regression, occurs in 3.0.0.GA


Test steps:
1. KS> Platform> XHR>File Download
2. Click "Abort"

Actual:
Application Error

Expected:
Alert message something like:"Please start file download before....."
fields.summary: iOS: XHR - File Download - Script Error if "Abort" button pressed
fields.environment:
Tested with:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201301281948
Titanium SDK, build: 3.0.2.v20130129171611
Devices:
iPad4 iOS 6.1
iPad2 iOS 5.1

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as we no longer use or support this version of Kitchen Sink.
